quotes: I'm smarter than most of these boulderheads and you know it!
Oh, I don't know about a Daring Do book, but I remember once seeing a passing griffon carrying a gold bound book with a dragon on the front,
many years ago. I think the griffon was called... Gilda?
Please don't make me talk about my feelings!
I don't care what my dad said! I'll show him and every dragon who thinks I'm just a little princess there are better things than being big
